TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlObjectSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides the base class used to serialize objects as XML streams or documents.

span.span: Provides the base class used to serialize objects as XML streams or documents.

summary.span: This class is abstract.

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充 ，便可建立您自己的序列化程式來序列化或還原序列化物件。Extend the to create your own serializer to serialize and deserialize objects. 類別和 類別都是繼承自 ，而且會用來序列化和還原序列化符合資料合約規則的物件 (使用 和 建立的物件)。Both the class and the class inherit from the and are used to serialize and deserialize objects that conform to data contract rules (objects created using the and the ). ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為 `WriteObjectWithInstance` 的方法，這個方法會包含 做為參數。The following example shows a method named `WriteObjectWithInstance` that includes an as a parameter. 這個方法會呼叫 方法，藉以序列化使用 或 的物件。The method serializes an object using either the or by calling the method. [!code-csharp[XmlObjectSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xmlobjectserializer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlObjectSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xmlobjectserializer/vb/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: the type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules.

span.span: the type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules.

exception.span: For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.

span.span: For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.

exception.span: there is a problem with the instance being serialized.

span.span: there is a problem with the instance being serialized.

span.para: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員： ， ， 。此外，和必須實作方法來讀取和還原序列化。
When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , . Additionally, the and methods must be implemented for reading and deserializing.

Protected Sub New ()

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會標記為保護的，以允許衍生類別鏈結建構函式。This constructor is marked protected to allow derived classes to chain constructors.

summary.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the serializer can read the object.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the serializer can read the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查讀取器是否位於要讀取的項目上，並在此項目為 XML 資料流或文件中所找到物件的最上層項目時，傳回 `true`。This method checks whether the reader is positioned on an element to read, and returns `true` if the element is the top-level element for the object found in the XML stream or document. 為了傳回 `true`，此時找到的項目必須具有預期的名稱。To return `true`, the found element must have an expected name. 實際的預期項目名稱需視序列化程式實作而定。The actual expected element name depends on the implementation of the serializer. 透過 ，此起始項目就可指定於延伸類別的建構函式中。With the , the starting element is specified in the constructor of the extension class. 如需範例，請參閱 類別的建構函式。For an example, see the constructors for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsStartObject (System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader reader);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsStartObject(class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader reader) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function IsStartObject (reader As XmlDictionaryReader) As Boolean
public: abstract bool IsStartObject(System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReader ^ reader);
abstract member IsStartObject : System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader -> bool

param.name: reader
param.span: An used to read the XML stream or document.

span.span: An used to read the XML stream or document.

summary.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is positioned over an XML element that can be read.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is positioned over an XML element that can be read.

returns.span: if the reader can read the data; otherwise, .

span.span: if the reader can read the data; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查讀取器是否位於要讀取的項目上，並在此項目為 XML 資料流或文件中所找到物件的最上層項目時，傳回 `true`。This method checks if the reader is positioned on an element to read, and returns `true` if the element is the top-level element for the object found in the XML stream or document. 實作會判定何時傳回 `true`。The implementation determines when to return `true`. 實作會檢查自己是否位於項目上，或是尋找預期的項目名稱。Implementations may check that they are positioned on an element or look for an expected element name. 其中一個 的實作，即 ，它會檢查自己是否位於項目上，也會檢查項目名稱是否為目前正在還原序列化之型別的最上層預期名稱。One implementation of the , the , checks that it is positioned on an element and also checks that the element name is the top level expected name for the type currently being deserialized. 如果有需要，在使用 方法讀取 XML 內容之前，可以讀取 XML 資料流中的其他屬性，並同時將其放置到最上層項目上。If needed, additional attributes in the XML stream can be read while positioned on the top level element before reading XML contents using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查讀取器是否位於要讀取的項目上，並在此項目為 XML 資料流或文件中所找到物件的最上層項目時，傳回 `true`。This method checks whether the reader is positioned on an element to read, and returns `true` if the element is the top-level element for the object found in the XML stream or document. 為了傳回 `true`，此時找到的項目必須具有預期的名稱。To return `true`, the found element must have an expected name. 實際的預期項目名稱需視序列化程式實作而定。The actual expected element name depends on the implementation of the serializer. 透過 ，此起始項目就可指定於延伸類別的建構函式中。With the , the starting element is specified in the constructor of the extension class. 如需範例，請參閱 類別的建構函式。For an example, see the constructors for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法屬於虛擬方法，它所擁有的預設實作會建立字典讀取器來讀取基礎資料流，並且將其還原序列化。This method is a virtual method, and has a default implementation that creates a dictionary reader to read the underlying stream and deserialize it. 預設實作會假設資料流是文字或 XML。The default implementation assumes the stream is text or XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須實作 、 和 方法。The , , and methods must be implemented. 這三個方法會被用來以下列模式連續寫入完整的序列化：寫入開始、寫入內容和寫入結束。The three methods are used in succession to write the complete serialization using the pattern: write start, write content, and write end. 在呼叫 和 之間，使用者可以在寫入物件期間插入 XML 屬性。Users can insert XML attributes during the writing of the object between the calls to and . 方法的虛擬實作也會呼叫這三個方法。The three methods are also called by the virtual implementation of the method.
